info.title: Swagger Petstore
info.description: A sample API that uses a petstore as an example to demonstrate features in the OpenAPI 3.0 specification

get.description: Returns all pets, optionally filtered by one or more criteria

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Filters pets by one or more tags

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Filters pets by type (dog, cat, or bird)

parameters.name: DOB
parameters.description: Filters pets by date of birth

post.description: Creates a new pet in the store.

requestBody.description: Pet to add to the store

Location.description: Swagger-Express-Middleware will automatically set this header appropriately

409.description: new pet conflicts with an existing pet (i.e. they have the same name)

delete.description: deletes a single pet based on the name supplied

get.description: get a list of the photos for a pet

Photo.description: information about the photo (size, file name, etc.)

Description.description: an optional description of the photo

Location.description: Swagger-Express-Middleware will automatically set this header appropriately
